Message:
Huh? So she just calls
all men “Daddy,”
and all women “Mommy?”

That’s what my prince explained
after he noticed me there.

Okay, if that’s the case,
then it’s fine...

But, she needs to change
how she refers to people...

She’s still a child,
so everything’s okay...
Daddy. Mommy...
Hehehe!

I was too caught by
surprise earlier to notice,

but she was inside
a mysterious hole that
was floating in midair.

Although I’m curious
about what that hole is...
my prince is talking to her
like it’s no big deal.

I’m sure he sees
how lonely she looks,
and wants to keep her calm.

Ahh...! I knew you were
a gentleman, my prince...!

You haven’t changed one bit
since the time you saved me...!
